named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_ADDRESSES_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Address address WHERE address.customer.id = :customerId AND address.isActive = TRUE ORDER BY address.id

named-query.name: BC_READ_ADDRESS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID_AND_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Address address WHERE address.customer.id = :customerId AND address.addressName = :addressName

named-query.name: BC_FIND_STATE_PROVINCES
named-query.query: SELECT stateProvince FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.StateProvince stateProvince ORDER BY stateProvince.shortName

named-query.name: BC_FIND_COUNTRIES
named-query.query: SELECT country FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Country country ORDER BY country.shortName
